overview: This documentary gives fascinating insights into the aspect of Chinese culture that evolved from the One Child policy. Young adults born during the first years of the policy are interviewed. They discuss the struggles with their parent's generation and their children's generation, the pros and cons they experienced being single children, their losses, their aspirations.
tagline: Only Me Generation is a documentary of self-exploration, which tells the personal stories of the effects of the One Child Policy from the first generation's point of view.
title: Only Me Generation
